definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself

sentences.english: Don't play with scissors or pen knives.
She noticed that the box cutter had disappeared from the room.
sentences.chinese: 女人同时注意到，之前房间里的美工刀已经消失了。

sentences.english: If you are a programmer, just get an artist.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是个程序员，只要找个美工就可以了。

sentences.english: We take away guns and bombs, the terrorists use box cutters.
sentences.chinese: 我们查获枪支和炸弹，恐怖分子使用美工刀。

sentences.english: The team undertakes the task of designing graphics for the computer game.
sentences.chinese: 这个小组承担了游戏的美工设计任务。

sentences.english: He graduated from Fu Shin High School and studied Advertisement Design.
sentences.chinese: 大东毕业于复兴美工的广告设计科。
美工图案无法完成此作业。

sentences.english: Don't wear sandals when working with an X-Acto knife.
sentences.chinese: 使用美工刀切割时，千万不要穿拖鞋。

sentences.english: A folding cutter is provided, which belongs to the cutter technology filed.
sentences.chinese: 折叠美工刀，属于刀具技术领域。

sentences.english: Use caution when cutting with the utility knife.
sentences.chinese: 使用时要多加小心切割与美工刀。

sentences.english: Just imagine your artist leaves halfway through the project.
sentences.chinese: 假设你的美工半途离开。

sentences.english: The palace interiors and exterior are a wonder of design and set decoration.
sentences.chinese: 宫殿的内外景展现了美工设计和场景布置的奇妙之处。

sentences.english: The artists did an amazing job on Neverwinter Nights 2.
sentences.chinese: 美工们在《无冬之夜2》中完成了一项惊人的工作。

sentences.english: They fuck up all the tables with their cutters.
sentences.chinese: 桌子总会被他们的美工刀搞砸。

sentences.english: No gun today, and all I had in my cart was a shovel and a box cutter.
sentences.chinese: 但今天我没带枪，而我的球车里只有铁铲和美工刀。

sentences.english: He also painted the box art for the Diablo Battle Chest.
sentences.chinese: 他同时也负责战网的框架美工。

definition: (publishing) layout and graphics/graphic design/art editor/graphic designer
(publishing) (abbr. for 美術編輯|美术编辑[mei3 shu4 bian1 ji2]) layout and graphics/graphic design/art editor/graphic designer
to draw designs, maps etc/picture (e.g. of life in the city)
